sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.ChangeConfigExportUtilityAjax</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>ChangeConfigExportUtility AJAX component for worker based export of multiple config records</description>
        <name>ChangeConfigExportUtilityAjax</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ChangeConfigExportUtilityAjax = Class.create();
ChangeConfigExportUtilityAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    process: function() {
		var table = this.getParameter("sysparm_ajax_processor_root_table");
		var sysId = this.getParameter("sysparm_ajax_processor_root_sys_id");
		var relatedStr = this.getParameter("sysparm_ajax_processor_related");
		
		var related = [];
		if (relatedStr)
			related = relatedStr.split(",");

		var cceu = ChangeConfigExportUtility();
		return cceu.workerSave(cceu.getConfigRecords(table, sysId, related));
    },

    type: 'ChangeConfigExportUtilityAjax'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-03-31 11:10:07</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>622719075333001034d1ddeeff7b1224</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ChangeConfigExportUtilityAjax</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Change Request" source="com.snc.change_request">9be0c58b6d2620100acb70b3534330c8</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_622719075333001034d1ddeeff7b1224</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-03-31 17:53:31</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>624</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
